thread.title: Chris: Warmer temps are here to stay, fall looks far away
thread.title_full: Chris: Warmer temps are here to stay, fall looks far away - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Chris Franklin, Meteorologist
title: Chris: Warmer temps are here to stay, fall looks far away
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - With lots of sunshine yesterday and an upper ridge, the high at the Airport climbed to 88Â°! We could see much of the same for today and tomorrow.
By Friday a breakdown of the ridge may keep temps a few degrees cooler, then a weak cold front for the weekend will drop afternoon highs into the low 80s with overnight lows in the 50s and 60s by Sunday and Monday.
No real Fall-like temps through the next 10 days.
Follow me on Twitter: @CFranklinFOX8
